
### network layer quality of service  {.smaller}

if packet … <br> []{.my-small} <table>
<tr><td>event</td><td>on IPv4/v6</td></tr>
<tr><td><!-- \hline --> collides with another</td><td>out of scope --- handled by link layer</td></tr>
<tr><td>[not received]{.fragment fragment-index=2 .custom .myem-only}\\tikzmark{not recv}</td><td>lost silently</td></tr>
<tr><td>header corrupted</td><td>usually discarded silently</td></tr>

<tr><td>reordered (v. other messages)</td><td>received out of order</td></tr>
<tr><td>destination unknown</td><td>usually dropped with notice</td></tr>
<tr><td>too much being sent</td><td>discard excess</td></tr>
<tr><td></td></tr>
</table>
